title: Wonder Woman
writer: Allan Heinberg, Zack Snyder, Jason Fuchs
actors: Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Robin Wright
plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.
language: English, German, Dutch, Flemish, French, Spanish, Chinese, Greek, Ancient (to 1453), North American Indian
